body: To be fair, I think it's a bit late for that last part. Also, while you're technically correct about the "heroin[e]" in the title, and I do agree with your assertion, there is an argument to be made that it's actually perfectly acceptable. Languages, especially between individuals of different nationality and culture, or even people using the same language, can be... ambiguous. Even moreso when dealing with creative writing and such... o.O
...Pretty sure the "ryona" tag is completely inappropriate here. o3o
